lst.name: sentence
lst.str: He and others said the overriding concern was that the requirements could drive the Eurobond market out of traditional EC centres like London and Luxembourg to Switzerland, the U.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: They said West Germany's main objection to the directive in its present form is that it considers as too stringent proposed rules laying down how much information companies issuing non-listed securities should disclose in their prospectuses.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The diplomats said Belgium has now given up attempts to have the directive adopted by EC ministers before it hands over the presidency of the 12-nation Community to Denmark on July 1.

lst.name: sentence
